title: Q1 OneForce Casemanagement - Reporting
description:
Description
Mit MagentaForce soll die Workflow-Lösung für Work im GrK-Bereich abgelöst werden. In Q3/24 soll der Schwenk von der IRRP zu MagentaForce gestartet werden. Es ist noch offen, ob der Schwenk schrittwiese oder in einem Zug erfolgt. Entsprechend werden dann für das Reporting analoge Kennzahlen zur heutigen IRRP-Lösung benötigt. 
  DoR Business Feature Status  
Benefit Hypothesis includes:
Business Value is clearly stated → INVEST
Acceptance criteria are defined
Functional View is provided, e.g. as Business Workflow or Use Case Diagram → who are the first actors/End Users?
Y
Versioned and visible in Roadmaps (e.g. Portfolio or Solution Roadmap).  
Realization of the Version fits into one PI.  
Approved by architects.  
Prioritized within the program/solution backlog: WSJF template shoud be applied: 
https://mywiki.confluence.telekom.de/download/attachments/1432413926/20221027%20SD%20X%20Solution%20WSJF%20Template.xlsx?version=1&modificationDate=1666948872000&api=v2  
Understood and estimated by all involved Digital Hubs/Agile Dev Teams who are realizing all relevant "Running Software Artefacts" to provide value for End Users.  
Dependencies are identified:
inside the Solution (between Digital Hubs in Solution) or
outside the Solution (external dependencies).
And there are no external dependencies that can't be solved within the Solution/Hub and with the help of other Solutions/Hubs.
  Real Business Features are classified as "Business Feature" in Jira (edit → Agile → Safe value type).  
Non-functional requirements (NFRs) are identified (e.g. Load & Performance).  
Security, privacy, working council approvals are labelled in Jira in case of relevance: (edit → Compliance → Compliance relevance). Y
Initial high-level acceptance test cases, incl. test data (e.g. BDD: given-when-then) - test shift left - have been written. And also reviewed by BOs, PMs & POs.  
Potential for test automation is identified.  
All the information relevant to development is linked: other stories/TBIs, relevant designs, confluence sources of information, screenshots, other vendor specs.

business_impact.justification: Mit MagentaForce soll die Workflow-Lösung für Work im GrK-Bereich abgelöst werden. In Q3/24 soll der Schwenk von der IRRP zu MagentaForce gestartet werden.

strategic_enablement.justification: Es ist noch offen, ob der Schwenk schrittwiese oder in einem Zug erfolgt. Entsprechend werden dann für das Reporting analoge Kennzahlen zur heutigen IRRP-Lösung benötigt.

time_criticality.justification: In Q3/24 soll der Schwenk von der IRRP zu MagentaForce gestartet werden.

footnotes: Bezugszeitraum ist 12 Monate nach Launch für neue/zusätzliche Umsatzerlöse
Kosten für Risiken = Schadenshöhe x Eintrittswahrscheinlichkeit

attachments.filename: Case Management Magenta Force Reporting - Anforderung OE47.pptx
